Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You recently downloaded our eBook "Omni-Channel Retailing: Strategies to Drive Traffic and Sales", which I hope you found informative. Understanding how to adopt omni-channel into your retail strategy can be challenging. That’s why we’re here. Our team of retail experts collaborates every day with industry leaders like you to develop digital strategies that:
- Are successfully used by leading retailers <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/PL_Handout_OmniChannel_Tactics_at_Work.pdf> - Drive conversions using mobile apps <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/PL_Handout_Drive_Conversions_with_Mobile_Apps.pdf> - Use responsive design to create a seamless shopping experience <http://www.slideshare.net/PivotalLabs/responsive-mobile-the-next-phase-of-retail-30806786>
Let’s co-innovate! Connect with the experts <mailto:info@pivotallabs.com?Subject=I want to co-innovate with Pivotal Labs> today and learn how to deliver engaging, interactive content across mobile and web products.
Sincerely, Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
